effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.

effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.

short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.
